As Vice-Chairman, he focused on enhancing the company’s relations with key external stakeholders. He also worked closely with the chairman and management team to chart the company’s strategic direction. While at Newbridge, Peter was instrumental in establishing the companyâ€™s Affiliates Program and was involved in the funding of more than 40 affiliate companies. He represented Newbridge as a board member for many of these affiliates.

Peter is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Ontario. Peter holds a Bachelor of Science from the University of Ottawa and an MBA from the University of Western Ontario.
